response.original_title: Il Volo: Buon Natale - Live From The Fillmore Miami Beach 2013
response.overview: 2013 live release from the young Italian tenor trio (Piero Barone, Ignazio Boschetto, and Gianluca Ginoble). BUON NATALE was filmed at the Fillmore Miami Beach at the Jackie Gleason Theater in front of an enthusiastic audience and adoring fans amidst a backdrop of Santa hats, decorated Christmas trees and beautifully wrapped presents. On this release, the group takes on American Christmas classics virtually unknown in their Italian culture. Joining Il Volo for the final song is Spanish-born Mexican singer/songwriter and actress, Belinda, who has sold over 2 million albums in the U.S. and 16 million albums worldwide. The 'Princess of Latin Pop' and Il Volo bring the house down as they sing the popular international Christmas song, "Feliz Navidad," written by Jose Feliciano.
response.title: Il Volo: Buon Natale - Live From The Fillmore Miami Beach 2013
